about_the_game:
This game is still in development by only one person.

Kary, an intriguing suspense game where you take on the role of a brave girl who finds herself alone and her house is being haunted by ghosts. Face your fears as you explore the dark rooms and hallways, where ghosts lurk in the shadows. Use your weapons, a camera and a lamp to move forward and defend yourself from the ghosts. Discover specific parts to hide from some of them. But be careful, some weapons do not work against some ghosts. Solve puzzles to progress and to discover more about the story.

Synopsis:

After the sudden and mysterious death of her parents, Kary, a brave and determined young girl, inherits the family house. Soon, the peace she longed for dissipates as the house becomes the epicenter of her nightmare, haunted by shadows and ghostly whispers, while the malevolent spirit of an ancient witch rises from the darkest depths.

As Kary explores the dark hallways and rooms of the house, she uncovers ancient journals and documents that reveal a connection between her family and the condemned witch. With the veil between the world of the living and the dead tearing apart, Kary is forced to confront her family's past and unravel the enigma shrouding the witch's tragic tale.

Kary must face her fears, uncover the truth behind the dark family history, and confront an ancestral evil that threatens to consume her. Will she unravel the hidden secrets in the mansion's corridors before the curse ensnares her as well?

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660 Super 6 GB / 5600 XT 8 GB

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
